column4: anyone know why when I logon, conky opens in it's own window and covers whatever toolbars and panels happen to be under it?  I switched own_window to "no" in the config, and then it doesn't load at all at logon.  I have to open it manually to get it to work right
conky has a lot of tweaks and things that may be needed depending on the window manager. check the conky homepage and the faq. they mention the proper settings for gnome and kde.
if it means anything, I'm still using whatever came on the live cd
then you are usiong the default conky config proberly is not using the proper settings..  the homepage has tons of config tips and info
